shared_stash.example: ākaṅkhamāno ca tvaṃ, sunakkhatta, acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi, jānāsi, āvuso korakkhattiya, attano gatin'ti? ṭhānaṃ kho pan'etaṃ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṃ te acelo korakkhattiyo byākarissati, jānāmi, āvuso sunakkhatta, attano gatiṃ, kālakañcikā nāma asurā sabbanihīno asurakāyo, tatr'āmhi upapanno'ti.
